descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/1239/screenshot201p.png[/img]
[b]Hello again.[/b]
I have make another better looking companion mod. Now its come time for Vilkas. He is cleaner, have better face shape and no more tattoo. I can also make him more \"Aragorn like\" with long hair, if you ask me. 

I have also change his shield into ebony. I hope you will like it.

Next will be Farkas, with companion armour like the rest of crew ; ) 


[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]

[img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/6168/vilkas2.png[/img]
[/center]

[center]
[b]Vilkas with long hair[/b]
I have upload file with long haired Vilkas (basic on Aragorn). Enjoy. 
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/10085-5-1329499791.png[/img]

[b] Version v0.2[/b]
Fixed problem with head/body color mismatch issues.
[/center]


[b]My other mod\'s:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9809]Calder Better Look[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9807]Vampiric Marcurio[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9974]Belrand New Strenght[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10000]Vampiric Calder[/url]

[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[b]Credits:[/b]
To Bethesda, for making Creation Kit and such a wonderfull game as Skyrim.
author: Gnatozuj
